name: Witness
description: Learn a character that was affected by an Evil ability.
hints: Can Learn:|- Who is the Puppet|- Corrupted character by an Evil|- Villager turned into Outcast by Counsellor|- Cloned character by Shaman|- Who was killed by an Evil
statement: No character was affected by an Evil
statement_regex: ^(?:(No) character was affected by an Evil|#(\d+) was affected by an Evil)$
category: Learn 1 character\affected by an Evil ability
